CustomField.description: Overall status of new employee forms, supporting documents and acceptance of company policies
CustomField.formula:
IF(
YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) < 2022, 'Completed',
IF ( sked__Is_Active__c = FALSE, 'Exited',
IF( ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c , 'Elevate UK') ,
IF(
AND( TEXT(New_Employee_Forms__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(ID__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Super_Forms__c) = 'Not', OR(TEXT(Work_Visa_Form__c) = 'Valid', TEXT(Work_Visa_Form__c) = 'Not'),
Presenter_Policy__c = TRUE, Code_of_Conduct__c = TRUE ), 'Completed', 'In Progress'),
IF(
AND( TEXT(New_Employee_Forms__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(ID__c) = 'Completed', OR(TEXT(Super_Forms__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Super_Forms__c) = 'Follow-up'), OR(TEXT(Work_Visa_Form__c) = 'Valid', TEXT(Work_Visa_Form__c) = 'Not'), OR(TEXT(Working_w_Childrens_Check__c) = 'Active',TEXT(Working_w_Childrens_Check__c) = 'Followup Required'), OR(TEXT(Appendix_11_Form__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Appendix_11_Form__c) = 'Not'), OR(TEXT(Child_Related_Work_Form__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Child_Related_Work_Form__c) = 'Not'), OR(TEXT(Police_check__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Police_check__c) = 'Not'),
OR(Presenter_Policy__c = TRUE, Contact_Exchange_Consent__c = TRUE), Code_of_Conduct__c = TRUE, Fair_Work_Information_Statement__c = TRUE ), 'Completed',
IF ( AND( TEXT(New_Employee_Forms__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(ID__c) = 'Completed', OR(TEXT(Super_Forms__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Super_Forms__c) = 'Follow-up'), OR(TEXT(Work_Visa_Form__c) = 'Valid', TEXT(Work_Visa_Form__c) = 'Not'), OR(TEXT(Working_w_Childrens_Check__c) = 'Approved awaiting card'), OR(TEXT(Appendix_11_Form__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Appendix_11_Form__c) = 'Not'), OR(TEXT(Child_Related_Work_Form__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Child_Related_Work_Form__c) = 'Not'), OR(TEXT(Police_check__c) = 'Completed', TEXT(Police_check__c) = 'Not'),
OR(Presenter_Policy__c = TRUE, Contact_Exchange_Consent__c = TRUE), Code_of_Conduct__c = TRUE, Fair_Work_Information_Statement__c = TRUE, Child_Safety_Code_of_Conduct__c = TRUE ), 'Completed (no card)',
'In Progress')))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Overall status of new employee forms, supporting documents and acceptance of company policies
CustomField.label: Onboarding Admin Status
